OrgName.entry: CHURCH OF CHRIST IN DARNALL, THE

Desc.entry: Local ecumenical partnership with Anglican, Methodist and United Reformed Churches.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sunday Service at 10.15am, Mon at 2.15pm (Sisterhood), Tues at 1pm (lunch club, Social Services referral), Wed 10-11.15am (Time Aside, parent and toddler group), Wed & Fri 10am-12noon (coffee morning), Wed 12.30-3pm (over 60s meeting), Wed 7-7.30pm (surgery, enquiries about baptisms, weddings etc), alternate Thurs at 12noon (meat and potato lunch), alternate Thurs at 7.30pm (Ladies Circle)
